attributes.action: better understanding and training for health professionals to deal with hydrocephalus
attributes.additional_details: campaigning for better training and understanding of hydrocephalus. pregnant women should be told and educated about hydrocephalus in antenatal classes and books, head measurements should be compulsory by health visitors and done everytime, parents should be listened too. gps should be given more training so they hae a better understanding. and leaflets in waiting rooms should be a must. more education in schools. its vital there should be more awareness, early diagnosis the better the outcome
